// RESTRICTED //
NO.CAS-8(4)/2013/DIV.-I (Vehicle)
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION)
‘A’ WING, JANPATH BHAWAN
JANPATH, NEW DELHI
Dated: 16/07/2013
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.: 11/2013
Subject: Facility of access to the vehicle in respect of his Holiness Shri Jagat Guru
Shankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati of Dwarka/Sharda Peeth
along with his ADC (G.R. Mishra) or a Private Secretary (B.R. Subhudanand)
up to the tarmac of all airports in the country for a period of one year w.e.f.
28/06/2013.
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. – 12/2012 dated 29/06/2012 on the
subject cited above.
2.
The competent authority has approved the facility of access to the vehicle in
respect of His Holiness Shri Jagat Guru Shankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati
of Dwarka/Sharda Peeth along with his ADC (Shri G.R. Mishra) or a Private Secretary
(Shri B.R. Subhudanand) up to the tarmac of all airports in the country for a period of
one year w.e.f. 28/06/2013.
This issues with the approval of In-charge Commissioner of Security (Civil
Aviation).
(Raja Srivastava, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution as per list attached / overleaf.
Copy to:
MCA (Shri U.K. Bhatia, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi: w.r.t. MCA letter no.
13024/39/2007-SS dated 09/07/2013.
